trends: There have been 3 other sightings in North Haven
There were no other sightings in North Haven on or around December 11th 2011
Summary: Looking up at stars, and then thought I saw a plane, but it never moved, so I thought it was a star or planet, but I could see lights moving on it, spoke to a neighborm, they see the lights moving too and the object just hovering, there are two of them,
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking up at stars, and then thought I saw a plane, but it never moved, so I thought it was a star or planet, but I could see lights moving on it, spoke to a neighborm, they see the lights moving too and the object just hovering, there are two of them, had my husband look, he saw it and said it might be a plane, but in the same spot for voer 20 minutes, Told a neighbor to go look and she sees them too. Gives same description of lights just hovering.
